Translations.Text: zastupnytstvo poserednykiv nikoly ne dopomozhe yim
Chomu vony tak neprykhylʹni do tse reminder
Bihayuchyy lyublyatʹ zebry
Khto tikayutʹ z leva
kozhnyy odyn z nykh zakhochutʹ otrymaty svyate pysannya osobysto
Diysno, vony ne bo U maybutnʹomu
Diysno, tse ye reminder
Dlya tsykh khto bazhayutʹ vzyaty uvahu
Vony ne mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu proty BOZHOHO budutʹ. Vin yavlyaye soboyu dzherelo righteousness; Vin yavlyaye soboyu dzherelo forgiveness
ya prysyahayu Dnem Resurrection
Ta ya prysyahayu osudzhuyuchoyu dusheyu
lyudsʹke isnuvannya dumayemo shcho my ne rekonstruyuyemo yoho kistky
Tak diysno; my vmiyemo rekonstruyuvaty yoho paletsʹ tip
Ale lyudsʹke isnuvannya maye tendentsiyu poviryty tilʹky shcho vin dyvytʹsya pered yo
Vin piddaye sumnivu Denʹ Resurrection
Odnoho razu zir tochytʹsya
Ta misyatsʹ eclipsed
Ta sontse ta krakh misyatsya u odyn odnym
lyudsʹke isnuvannya skazhe na shcho denʹ, "De yavlyaye soboyu vtechu
Absolyutno, nemaye vtechi
Do vashoho Lorda, na shcho denʹ, yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude informuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, vse vin shchob prosunutysya sebe, ta vse vin do rehresu sebe
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude yoho vlasnyy suddya
Nomer ne vybachaye bude vyznavatysya
Ne posuvayutʹ vash yazyk hasten tse
Tse - my shcho zberemo tse u Quran
Odnoho razu my deklamuyemo tse, vy budete proslidkuvaty taki Quran
Todi tse - my shcho roz'yasnymo tse
